indications: Abdominal pain caused by roundworms, pinworms, hookworms or tapeworms

contraindications: Use with caution in weak or debilitated patients.
Side effects include tinnitus and transient abdominal pain.

useCases: Dislodges and expels pinworms, hookworms and tapeworms.
As a steam and wash for vaginal itching.

notes: Some sources say that this herb kills parasites in the five internal organs, stops malarial disorders and can be applied to noxious sores.
Some sources say that this herb enters the Liver channel, regulates rebellious Qi, treats congealed Phlegm and Qi Stagnation in the whole body and kills parasites.
Use alone for abdominal pain from Intestinal parasites.
Northern Carpesii Bei He Shi is better for expelling parasites, especially tapeworms.
Southern Carpesii, Fructus Carotae Nan He Shi is the seed of the wild carrot.
